= Introduction =
[http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/middleware/weblogic/overview/index.html Weblogic] is a popular Java container that can even be run without cost (i.e. no support) in production.  Klistret has been tested mainly in this contain and all of the default settings are geared to Weblogic.
